title: Tourist visa (subclass 676)
summary: This page provides information for individuals who already hold a Tourist visa (subclass 676), which is now closed to new applications. It explains visa validity, conditions, rights, obligations, and options for extending stay through a Visitor visa (subclass 600).

visa_details.description: Allows single or multiple entries to Australia for a period determined by the Department.

holder_information.audience: People already granted a Tourist visa (subclass 676)
holder_information.vevo_availability: Visa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO) can be used for free to check visa details and entitlements

entry_rules: Some visas allow only a single entry; a new visa is required to return after leaving
Some visas allow multiple entries while valid, but total time in Australia cannot exceed the granted stay period

work_conditions: Must not work unless granted a visa that specifically allows work
Volunteer work allowed only if the work is not otherwise paid to an Australian resident; reimbursement allowed for out-of-pocket expenses
visa_conditions.study_conditions: Must not study for more than 3 months while in Australia
visa_conditions.health_insurance: May be required to maintain adequate health insurance

extending_stay.when_to_apply: At least 2 weeks before current visa expires
eligibility_criteria: Substantially complied with conditions of previous visa
Meet all eligibility criteria for Visitor visa (subclass 600)
Do not have Condition 8503 ('No further stay')

no_further_stay_condition.effect: Holders cannot apply for a Visitor visa (subclass 600)

stay_limits.visitor_and_working_holiday_holders: Can extend stay only up to a total of 12 months unless exceptional circumstances apply
stay_limits.instruction_for_12_month_stay_holders: Must contact nearest Australian visa office before applying for another visa

extending_stay.visa_effects: Grant of another visa will cease any current visa or ETA and attached entitlements
extending_stay.pending_application_rule: If application is undecided before original visa expires, holder may stay until finalisation
extending_stay.refusal_obligation: Must leave Australia before authorised stay period expires if refused another visa
